localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: AirConsole Meet lets you instantly play games with your team in Zoom, Google Meet or any other video conferencing service. The games allow colleagues to bond together while working from home. Perfect for team building during the pandemic.
blogPost.body: AirConsole Meet lets you instantly play games with your team in Zoom, Google Meet or any other video conferencing service. The games allow colleagues to bond together while working from home. Perfect for team building during the pandemic.
blogPost.title: AirConsole Meet - Play games in video calls with your team
blogPost.author: Rafael Morgan

localize.description: AirConsole Meet让您可以在Zoom、Google Meet或任何其他视频会议服务中与您的团队即时玩游戏。这些游戏可以让同事们在家中工作的同时团结在一起。非常适合在流行病期间进行团队建设。
localize.tagline: 与你的团队在视频通话中玩游戏

localize.description: AirConsole Meet讓您可以在Zoom、Google Meet或任何其他視頻會議服務中與您的團隊即時玩遊戲。這些遊戲可以讓同事們在家中工作的同時團結在一起。非常適合在流行病期間進行團隊建設。
localize.tagline: 與你的團隊在視頻通話中玩遊戲

previous.excerpt: Highlight your Clubhouse event in social media. Paste the link of your event, and get a neat preview page you can share online.
previous.title: Flipp for Clubhouse - Highlight your Clubhouse event on social media

localize.description: 在社交媒体上突出你的会所活动。粘贴你的活动链接，并得到一个整洁的预览页面，你可以在网上分享。
localize.tagline: 在社交媒体上突出你的会所活动

localize.description: 在社交媒體上突出你的會所活動。粘貼你的活動鏈接，並得到一個整潔的預覽頁面，你可以在網上分享。
localize.tagline: 在社交媒體上突出你的會所活動

next.excerpt: A time tracking app focused on life itself rather than projects, tasks, and more specific types. It helps to generalize a day and make it easier to document your life. It just takes 5 seconds to log your day. You don't have to remember each minute.
next.title: Horae - Measure your life, log your hours and document your life

localize.description: 一款专注于生活本身的时间追踪应用，而不是项目、任务和更具体的类型。它有助于概括一天的生活，让你更容易记录生活。它只需要5秒钟就可以记录你的一天。你不必记住每一分钟。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，记录你的时间，记录你的生活。

localize.description: 一款專注於生活本身的時間追蹤應用，而不是項目、任務和更具體的類型。它有助於概括一天的生活，讓你更容易記錄生活。它只需要5秒鐘就可以記錄你的一天。你不必記住每一分鐘。
localize.tagline: 衡量你的生活，記錄你的時間，記錄你的生活。
